DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to establish the maximum tolerated dose of BMS-754807 when administered orally on a once daily schedule in subjects with solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study of BMS-754807 in Patients With Solid Tumors in Japan
DOC.criteria: Advanced or metastatic solid tumors for whom the standard of care is ineffective or inappropriate Life expectancy of at least 3 months Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance 01 Any disorder with dysregulation of glucose homeostasis Dumping syndrome History of glucose intolerance
